professionalSummary: Results-driven Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience in designing and implementing innovative software solutions. Expertise in C#, ASP.NET Core, Angular, and AI-driven tools. Skilled in developing scalable microservices and optimizing workflows through AI integration. Proven track record in team leadership and delivering high-quality products on time and within budget.

experience.title: Software Engineer
achievements: Developed a Chrome extension, increasing operational efficiency by 20%
Implemented microservices architecture for ASP.NET Core Web API, reducing system downtime by 30%
Utilized AI tools to optimize processes, enhancing work productivity by 10x

experience.title: Individual Coordinator (Product Owner)
achievements: Managed end-to-end product development, client acquisition, and stakeholder engagement
Designed UX interfaces and converted designs to HTML using AI tools
Implemented Generative AI solutions, reducing design-to-development time by 50%

experience.title: Lead Software Engineer
achievements: Led Angular 6 application feature development, improving delivery timelines by 20%
Trained a team of 5 developers in Angular 6

positions: Senior Software Engineer at Galaxy Weblink Ltd. (Apr 2017 – Nov 2017)
Software Engineer at Infobeans Technologies Pvt. Ltd. (Aug 2015 – Nov 2016)
Junior Software Engineer & Trainer at Gate6 Technologies Pvt. Ltd. (July 2013 – Aug 2015)
.NET Trainer at NIIT Ltd., Bhopal (July 2010 – May 2013)
